BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Add additional debug logging for indexing failure. (#117728) This change adds a new IndexingOperationListener that logs debug logging for indexing failures. Today `IndexShard` logger needs to be set to TRACE in order to see indexing failures. This logger is very verbose and logs many other aspects of indexing at trace level. This new logger is targeted just for seeing indexing failures. Relates #117700
